WHAT IT IS AND HOW
IT WORKS

CBD is short for cannabidiol. It is a phytocannabinoid found in many ways.* Charlotte’s Web products have cannabinoids with CBD extract.

Not to be confused with oil from hemp seeds (which doesn’t contain cannabinoids), CBD comes from the flowers and leaves of the hemp plant.

Why does CBD work? The human body has a vast network of receptors, the endocannabinoid system.

WHAT IT IS

CBD is short for cannabidiol. It is a phytocannabinoid found in many ways.* Charlotte’s Web products have cannabinoids with CBD extract.

Not to be confused with oil from hemp seeds (which doesn’t contain cannabinoids), CBD comes from the flowers and leaves of the hemp plant.

HOW IT WORKS

Why does CBD work? The human body has a vast network of receptors, the endocannabinoid system.

Frequently asked questions

What is Cannabidiol (CBD)?
Because CBD from hemp has no psychoactive effects, the purchase, sales, or possession of hemp CBD products are completely legal in all 50 States.
Is Hemp-Derived Cannabidiol (CBD) Legal?
Because CBD from hemp has no psychoactive effects, the purchase, sales, or possession of hemp CBD products are completely legal in all 50 States.
